title: Levelized cost of energy for renewables
subtitle: The average cost per unit of energy generated across the lifetime of a new power plant. This data is expressed in US dollars per [kilowatt-hour](#dod:watt-hours). It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in living costs between countries.
internalNotes:
As explained in Annex I of the 2022 report (page 193):
"All costs presented in this report are denominated in real, 2022 US dollars; that is to say, after inflation has been taken into account, unless otherwise stated."
